### Make an LED-lit sign 

for the front/back/lateral

- Design artwork that will go on the panels: draw it on the plywood with a pencil

- Use the jigsaw to cut the artwork design: we initially drill a wide hole that the jigsaw will fit through, and then use the jigsaw to cut the design.
